meanings.definition: A person who attends or is present at a particular event or place.
meanings.sent1: The attender enjoyed the concert in the park.
meanings.sent2: The attender always shows up for movie nights.
meanings.sent3: The attender at the zoo was mistaken for a zookeeper!
meanings.sent4: She was like an eager attender at the feast of life.
meanings.sent5: The attender's presence lit up the room.

meanings.definition: A person who regularly goes to a particular place or event.
meanings.sent1: The attender of the library loved reading books.
meanings.sent2: The attender of the gym never misses a workout.
meanings.sent3: The attender of the bakery had a sweet tooth.
meanings.sent4: He was a loyal attender of the weekly farmers' market.
meanings.sent5: The attender of the art class was always inspired by creativity.
